en.on_start:
Welcome to picturaBot\.
This bot can transfer telegram stickers to VK\.
At the beginning\: send me your VK token, which can be got [here](https://oauth.vk.com/authorize?client_id=6949573&scope=65540&redirect_uri=https://oauth.vk.com/blank.html&display=page&response_type=token&revoke=1)\.
en.also_know:
I also know you.
There's no reason to start our relationship again.
en.expired_token:
Token is expired\.
Using this [link](https://oauth.vk.com/authorize?client_id=6949573&scope=65540&redirect_uri=https://oauth.vk.com/blank.html&display=page&response_type=token&revoke=1) send me new\, please\.
